visual.name: candlestick
visual.description: Candlestick with volume, band and trendlines

license.description: Applicable only when license is acquired from https://pbivizedit.com and not from Microsoft AppSource.

companyName.description: Name of the company or person to which license is issued

expirationDate.description: Your license is valid till given date (YYYY-MM-DD)

sorts.description: Stores sort definitions defined in sorting dialog

axisSorts.description: Stores sort definitions defined for each axis

dataVersion.description: current data version stored for backward compatibility purposes

analytics.description: Stores analytics definitions defined in analytic dialog

displayToolbar.description: Determines toolbar should be displayed or not when user is editing report.

maxRows.description: Defines maximum number of rows to fetch, in the multiple of 5000 rows.

scroll.description: Determine scroll behavior of the chart

stackAreaStacked.description: Determines area charts should be stacked or not.

position.description: Select the location of the Legend

title.description: Display a title on legend symbols

axisRangeType.description: Define axis data type. Choose 'Auto' to select automatically.

show.description: Show/hide axis, it's line and axis labels altogether

showLine.description: Show/hide axis line. This keeps labels intact

canZoom.description: Allow user to zoom axis. To zoom, click mouse left button and drag it in the direction of axis. To reset, double click on chart area.

axisTickInterval.description: Leave it blank to auto-calculate. Integer value for linear axis and M<number> (ex M12 for one year) for date axis.

titleText.description: Text to display as title. Leave blank to compute automatically.

isAxisLabelAngleCustom.description: True to manually set axis label angle

axisLabelAngle.description: Define axis label angle. It can be from -90 to 90. To draw labels vertically, choose 90

axisLabelPrefix.description: Prefix will be added before the axis label.

axisLabelSuffix.description: Suffix will be added after axis label.

axisLabelFormat.description: Axis label format. This supports D3 formats and not PowerBI formats as of now.

showDivider.description: Show/hide dividers among multi-categories. Applicable only when axis type is Multi-category.

concatenateLabels.description:
Text that will be used to join axis labels. It is applicable only when there are multiple attributes on the axis and they are joined. example:
, etc.

concatenateOrderReverse.description: Order of joining should be reversed or in the order they are provided

axisRangeType.description: Define axis data type. Choose 'Auto' to select automatically.

side.description: Define where should the axis be placed with w.r.t. anchored x axis

show.description: Show/hide axis, it's line and axis labels altogether

showLine.description: Show/hide axis line. This keeps labels intact

canZoom.description: Allow user to zoom axis. To zoom, click mouse left button and drag it in the direction of axis. To reset, double click on chart area.

lowerBound.description: Define in percentage from where the axis should start on visual canvas

upperBound.description: Define in percentage till where the axis should end on visual canvas

yaxis.description: Determine which y axis this value should be used

transparency.description: Transparency of candlestick. It's value can be from 0 to 100. 100 means the candlesticks are transparent.

lineWidth.description: Border width of the candle in px. For ohlc charts, it is bar line width in px

tickWidth.description: Sets the width of the open/close tick marks for ohlc bars.

yaxis.description: Determine which y axis this value should be used

lineTransparency.description: Transparency of line. It's value can be from 0 to 100. 100 means the line is transparent.

connectGaps.description: If some data points are missing in between, extrapolate line and join the gap

thickness.description: Determines how thick the line can be.

shape.description: Determines line shape. For example, smooth.

fillType.description: Determines the way area is filled.

fillColor.description: Color by which area will be filled. By default if you change line color, area will be filled with the same color.

transparency.description: Transparency of area chart. It's value can be from 0 to 100. 100 means the area is transparent.
